task_completion.description: The ability to successfully complete the given task.

environment_interaction.description: The ability to interact with and navigate the virtual environment appropriately.

following_instructions.description: The ability to follow the task guidelines and specific instructions.

legal_action.description: The appropriateness of chosen actions, whether they are valid and legal according to the available actions provided.

adaptability.description: The capacity to adapt and adjust the strategy based on the environment's feedback.

thought_process.description: The quality of the thought process displayed while solving the task.

efficiency.description: The effectiveness in completing the task in minimum number of steps.

termination.description: The correct usage of 'TERMINATE' in the appropriate situations according to the task guidelines.
